enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: Reduces damage from explosions and explosion knockback. Also slightly reduces all damage if level 3 or above.
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: Reduces the effects of fire damage and burn time when set on fire. Also slightly reduces all damage if level 3 or above.
enchantment.minecraft.projectile_protect: Reduces damage from projectiles such as arrows and fire balls. Also slightly reduces all damage if level 3 or above.
